Package entrants.utils.graph

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • entrants.utils.graph.Edge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EdgeInterface<Node>, WeightedEdgeInterface<Node>
    public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightedEdgeInterface<Node>
    This class describes an Edge between two neighbouring nodes in the game. An Edge is not oriented. An Edge has a distance. If the Edge links two nodes that are not adjacent in the game, it can have pills & power pills. The allowed weights are 'pills', 'power_pills' & 'distance'

    • Constructor Detail

      • Edge

        public Edge​(Node nodeA,
            Node nodeB)
        Initializes an Edge with two given nodes. The distance between the nodes is computed and the other weights(pill & power pills) are set to 0. The nodes are labelled A & B even though there is no order. To ensure that an edge is non sensitive to the order in witch nodeA & nodeB are given, they are registered according to their comparison basically, nodeA will have the 'minimum' & nodeB will have the 'maximum"
        Parameters:
        nodeA - The 'first' node of the Edge
        nodeB - The 'second' node of the edge

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)

        Overrides:

      • chainToEdge

        public static Edge chainToEdge​(Node startingNode,
                               java.util.List<Edge> edges)
        Converts a chain of edges to an Edge. The given edges must be in the order in the form A-B-C-...-X-Y-Z
        Parameters:
        startingNode - The starting node of the chain (the node A)
        edges - a list of edges
        Returns:
        an edge which is the sum of the given edges. The sum is done on the weights of the edges & the nodes in between.
